body: You're meant to wrap the decoder cell in the AttentionWrapper.  The previous attention is passed via the *state* of the AttentionWrapper if you set the argument `output_attention=False` ([here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/afa03e2fd91a2d4a7dc960c5ec4ee448c808d026/tensorflow/contrib/seq2seq/python/ops/attention_wrapper.py#L994)).  In practice we haven't seen too much of a difference when training if using one or the other.
